timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time'
| filter (resource.project_id == 'unoperate-test')
| filter (resource.cluster_name == 'bigtablesink-k8s-cluster')
| filter (resource.pod_name == 'load-generator' || resource.container_name == 'my-connect-cluster-connect')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.pod_name],
    [value_core_usage_time_aggregate: aggregate(value.core_usage_time)]

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes'
| filter (resource.project_id == 'unoperate-test')
| filter (resource.cluster_name == 'bigtablesink-k8s-cluster')
| filter (resource.pod_name == 'load-generator' || resource.container_name == 'my-connect-cluster-connect')
| align next_older(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.pod_name],
    [value_used_bytes_aggregate: aggregate(value.used_bytes)]

numerator.filter: resource.type="consumed_api" AND metric.type="serviceruntime.googleapis.com/api/request_count" AND project="unoperate-test" AND resource.labels.service="bigtable.googleapis.com" AND (metric.labels.response_code_class=one_of("4xx", "5xx"))
